alphyn.title: Alphyn
alphyn.description: They may be made of a muddle of bits, but these fast foes attack twice, and cast Kaboom, Bounce and Feel the Burn.
alphyn.secondaryDescription: They were created by the Grand Architect, Zenus, to massacre the mortals, and faithfully follow his orders still.

badboon.title: Badboon
badboon.description: Giant apes and lords of the jungle who store up their anger, then attack with full, explosive force.

badger-mager.title: Badger Mager
badger-mager.description: Badgers who have begun the long journey on the Way of the Badja, but have only learnt one spell so far:

badja.title: Badja
badja.description: Pure-hearted masters of the mighty Way of the Badja, they evade blows with a mysterious mist, and foil magic with

battering-ram.title: Battering Ram
battering-ram.description: Their hairy hides are hard to harm with ice. They send enemies to sleep with

bewarewolf.title: Bewarewolf
bewarewolf.description: It's best to bash these baddies quickly, as their tension is turned up a notch every time they take damage.

big-badboon.title: Big Badboon
big-badboon.description: Swirling whirlwinds of unstoppable power. If they call on a friend, prepare for the end!

blastoad.title: Blastoad
blastoad.description: Heavy toad tanks that pound enemies with poisonous rounds, and whose tongue lashings would make even the toughest tremble.

bling-badger.title: Bling Badger
bling-badger.description: Grandmasters of the Way of the Badja, these shining paragons bring both brains and brawn to bear in their supreme style.
bling-badger.secondaryDescription: Legends tells that when the badjas bow down to their sacred solid-gold statue, the bling badgers will come to save them.

boppin--badger.title: Boppin' Badger
boppin--badger.description: Badgers with large leaves and the gift of the groove. Their moves are admired by many in the monster world.
boppin--badger.secondaryDescription: They'd rather be dancing than doing battle, so they beat their bellies like bongos to try and get travellers tapping their toes too.

battleInfo.elementalAversions: Takes 1.25x damage from Dark and Light.

brainy-badboon.title: Brainy Badboon
brainy-badboon.description: Astute apes that weaken enemies with

equinox.title: Equinox
equinox.description: Ceaseless steed of death, who tirelessly travels the skies, taking the lives of all in his path. Also known as the Black Star.
equinox.secondaryDescription: Gallops freely through the night skies, and answers only to the stars. Once had an entirely different form…

excalipurr.title: Excalipurr
excalipurr.description: A spectacularly skilled lord of the sword, and wielder of a bewitching blade that can only be used by those it chooses.
excalipurr.secondaryDescription: Deems very few worthy of facing him, as his sword is said to sing with the power of the Almighty Himself.

hammibal.title: Hammibal
hammibal.description: An impeccably-armoured and impressively massive monster who may look mean, but has a huge heart as well.
hammibal.secondaryDescription: Once lived in a lovely palace with his equally lovely daughter, but woke one day to find himself sealed away in a grotto.

meowgician.title: Meowgician
meowgician.description: Fierce felines also known as Frizzcats because they fire off frequent blasts of

battleInfo.elementalAversions: Takes 1.25x damage from Dark and Light.
ailmentAffinities: 25% resistance to Sleep, Confuse, Blunt, Sap, and Divine Intervention

nemean.title: Nemean
nemean.description: This ultimate being combines the best of nature's creations, and its heavenly form has earned it the nickname 'Godbeloved'.
nemean.secondaryDescription: It was once able to speak the mortal tongue, but has forgotten both that and its true form in its long years of captivity.

ram-raider.title: Ram Raider
ram-raider.description: These rampant rams will do nothing but nut you, but you'd do well to defend yourself when their tension is high.
ram-raider.secondaryDescription: They faithfully follow their fathers' advice to get their heads down and charge headlong into all that life hurls at them.

battleInfo.elementalAversions: Takes 1.25x damage from Dark and Light.
ailmentAffinities: 25% resistance to Dazzle, Sleep, Confuse, Stun, Poison, Paralyze, and Decelerate. Immune to Fizzle.
